flavorText: The mage felt as though he'd been in the stasis suit for days. Upon his return, he found it was months.

foreignData.name: Erschöpfung
foreignData.text: Alle Kreaturen und Länder, die ein Gegner Deiner Wahl kontrolliert, enttappen nicht während seiner nächsten Enttap-Phase.

name: Exhaustion
originalText: Creatures and lands target opponent controls do not untap during his or her next untap phase.

rulings.text: The creatures and lands are only prevented from untapping during the targeted player’s next untap step. They can still can untap during other player’s untap steps.
No creatures or lands controlled by the player will untap during their next untap step. This includes those which entered the battlefield after Exhaustion resolved.

text: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during their next untap step.
